summary: When a man dodges conviction after raping multiple women, his victims take justice into their own hands.
cast: Frank Stallone|Donna Denton|Terry Moore|Peter Liapis|Jack Carter|Jerry Van Dyke|Henry Darrow|Martin Landau|Lisa London|Leslie Scarborough|Marcia Karr|Gretchen Becker|Leila Carlin|Beverly Hart|Linda Kurimoto|Charles Provenzano|Wally K. Berns|Don Swayze|George 'Buck' Flower|Georgette Baker|Jeff Kaake|Mark Logan|Ron Arragon|Jerome Broomfield|Pamela Garner|Cynthia Goodwins|Bernice Tamara Goor|Denzil Jerome|Henry Moore|Jeff Prettyman|Lloyd Redick|Tara Summers
title: W.A.R.: juez, jurado, ejecutor
